name: Earth & Cursor
description:
Story

In a parallel universe where planets can move. The Earth is in danger because it lost its moon and now it only can avoid the Asteroids and Aliens that chase it, but one day something come from another universe to join forces with the Earth and help it to survive to this menace. Can you help the Earth to survive?

Controls

  • WASD: To move
  • Right Click: To destroy enemies.
  • M: To mute the music
  • Space: To skip the initial cinematic.
